about_the_game:
**This content is featured in the "Ultimate Supporter Edition" BUNDLE**

Do&De Worlds DELUXE CONTENT features:

  • A PDF Artbook with a collection of the best concept arts and illustrations made during the 4 years of development
  • 5 unique BLUEPRINTS to craft classy headgears (use the Anvil and the Spinning Wheel to craft them)

This DLC is a way to show us your love and support for the Doom & Destiny series!

All the nerds at Heartbit Interactive and even the Flying Spaghetti Monster itself thanks you from the bottom of their heart..bits.
Happy gaming.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8182 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphic with at least 1024 MB Ram
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

short_description: An Artbook with a collection of the best illustrations and in-game unique blueprints for true nerds. This content requires the base game on Steam in order to play.
supported_languages: English, Italian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
